summary: Wrongfuly condemned for execution, you find your self no other than paying the price of your innocents.
descriptionHtml:
Wrongfuly condemned for execution, you find your self no other than paying the price of your innocents. Your family has been kiddnaped by the Thalmor, as your mind is uneased for your loved ones. Talos has heard your cries and with the twist of events a dragon has caused a mist of confusion allowing you to escape, for your journey is not over but just begining.

Name: Vikus
Level: 2
Religion: Believer in Talos
Occupation: Farmer
Role: Warrior / Sword & Board

This is just a saved file for the time-being but. You are equiped with Legendary Imperial Armor (Heavy)/Weapons, this saved file was created for roleplaying as a imperial legion but will be expanded once the Creation Kit is released. Epic quests will be involved.
author: PROXiCiDE
